title: Emerald and Diamond Floral Jhumka - శోభాయమానమైన పచ్చ మరియు వజ్రాల జుంకాలు
materials: 22K Gold base with White Gold accents
featuring vibrant Emerald cabochons and meticulously set Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Finished with Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster. Delicate Pearl drop.
features: Intricate floral filigree design studded with CZ stones. Features a dome-shaped Jhumka bell, with a emerald center. The pearl at the bottom of the jhumka bell provide a delicate touch and complement the CZs. The earrings also have a contemporary flair making them ideal for both traditional and modern tastes.
colors: with a striking Emerald green center and a pearl base.
occasions: and special occasions like Seemantham or half-saree functions. Also suitable for adding a touch of elegance to evening wear.
description: A perfect blend of traditional Jhumka design with modern floral aesthetics. The Emerald and CZ stone combination offers a dazzling sparkle. The Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting brilliance. The detailed craftsmanship speaks volumes about the artistry involved, making it a valuable addition to your jewelry collection.
